**[Recall Knowledge - Ethereal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 48 **[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 48 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 [Jin-Hae](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1516) **Source** [Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain](/Sources.aspx?ID=87) pg. 18 **Perception** +33 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +37, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +36, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +31, [Warfare Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +38 **Str** +9 **Dex** +9 **Con** +5 **Int** +5 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +5 **Items** [wind and fire wheels](/Weapons.aspx?ID=167) (2), [hook swords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=163) (2) --- **AC** 43 **Fort** +33 **Ref** +30 **Will** +27 –1 status penalty to all saves vs. [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects **HP** 340 **Immunities** [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), precision **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Susceptible to Death** Though phantoms aren't alive, neither are they [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), and they are uniquely vulnerable to the effects of death. A phantom whose Hit Points are reduced to 0 as a result of a [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effect (such as from a spell like [_finger of death_](/Spells.aspx?ID=116)) is immediately whisked away to the River of Souls, where their soul resumes the usual path to the afterlife.
**Combined Charge** ([move Frequency once per day](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) **Trigger** [Cloudsplitter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1517) Strides or [Tramples](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39) within 5 feet of Jin-Hae; **Effect** Jin-Hae leaps onto Cloudsplitter's back as he charges. She can make a single melee attack against any target they pass during Cloudsplitter's movement. --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** _hook sword_ +35 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196), [Twin](/Traits.aspx?ID=197)), **Damage** 6d6+20 slashing **Melee** _linked hook swords_ +35 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 6d6+20 slashing **Melee** _wind and fire wheels_ +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [Twin](/Traits.aspx?ID=197), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d6+15 slashing plus 3d6 fire **Ranged** vacuum slash +35 ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [range 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 6d6+10 slashing **Divine Innate Spells** DC 40 - **Constant (7th)** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6) **Call a Battle Echo** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33)) **Effect** Jin-Hae pulls one of the _battle echoes_ (page 19) to her hand. She is fully aware of every _echo_ and can always pull the one she wants, but she cannot call an _echo_ that has already been unsealed. **Link Swords** ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73), [Stance](/Traits.aspx?ID=152)) **Requirements** Jin-Hae is wielding two hook swords; **Effect** Jin-Hae either links her swords together or unlinks them. If the swords are linked, she can make linked hook sword Strikes; if the swords are unlinked, she can make hook sword Strikes. **Wind-Fire Charge** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Requirements** Jin-Hae is wielding her wind and fire wheels; **Effect** Jin-Hae blasts off on her wind and fire wheels, leaving an elemental trail in her wake. She Strides up to twice her Speed and makes a wind and fire wheel Strike at any point during her movement. The path left by her movement is filled with her choice of an 8th-level [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) or [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) spell. Jin-Hae is unaffected by any walls she creates with this ability. She cannot use Wind-Fire Charge again for 1d4 rounds. If she uses Wind-Fire Charge again, the wall created by her previous Wind-Fire Charge disappears as soon as her action is completed. **Wind-Fire Chariot** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Requirements** Jin-Hae is wielding two wind and fire wheels; **Effect** Jin-Hae's wind and fire wheels float by her feet, giving her the benefits of 7th-level [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6). While this lasts, she can wield her wind and fire wheels even while her hands are full by kicking with them, and her wind and fire wheels gain the [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) trait as well as the effects of a [_returning_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) rune.
name: Jin-Hae
